title: Bright spots of unique flavours
content: Many local chefs these days like to reinterpret the food they grew up with by putting together the ingredients in creative ways in a Western dish.    It does not always work because why would I want to eat something that reminds me of a hawker dish when the original dish tastes better and is much cheaper to boot?
